page.title: 14Survey on the Village Shop
page.content: In Ellastone there is a population of 250 people, The shops in Ellastone are a Butchers, a craft shop and a general village store, which sells groceries, bread and newspapers etc and is also a Post Office.We did a shopping survey and five children stood outside and we all asked three people questions. First we asked where they came from: 5 of these people lived in the village. 7 people lived in a neighbouring village. 3 were holiday makers. We asked how often they used the shop: 8 people used the shop every day. 5 used it 2 or 3 times each week. 3 used it less often. We asked if they would like any more shops: 13 people said no. 2 people said yes they would like a tea shop.
